member.name: M:BitMono.Utilities.AsmResolver.CloneHelper.CloneSafely(AsmResolver.DotNet.Cloning.MemberCloner,AsmResolver.DotNet.ModuleDefinition,AsmResolver.DotNet.ModuleDefinition)
member.summary: Clones via AsmResolver's API, but removes the assembly reference from . This is needed as a workaround, because sometimes AsmResolver adds a reference of the included item to a . See here more details about that problem: https://github.com/sunnamed434/BitMono/issues/207

member.name: M:BitMono.Utilities.Runtime.DotNetRuntimeInfoEx.GetFrameworkDescription
member.summary: Retrieves the description of the .NET runtime (e.g., ".NET Core 3.1", ".NET 5.0").

member.name: M:BitMono.Utilities.Runtime.DotNetRuntimeInfoEx.GetNetFrameworkVersion
member.summary: Try to get the .NET Framework version (only works if running on .NET Framework).

member.name: M:BitMono.Utilities.Runtime.DotNetRuntimeInfoEx.IsRunningOnMono
member.summary: Checks if the application is running on Mono.

member.name: M:BitMono.Utilities.Runtime.EnvironmentRuntimeInformation.ToString
member.summary: Retrieves detailed information about BitMono runtime, like running OS, .NET Framework/.NET Core version, etc.
